description.value: The invigorating fusion fills its wielder with vigor when defeating foes. After making a successful attack with this weapon that drops a foe (by killing it or rendering it @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.lf8pbezocjYIvR9y]{Unconscious}), you feel a rush of energy that eliminates the fatigued condition and reduces exhaustion to fatigue. If you were neither @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.33ynSbmexuxC3cAQ]{Exhausted} nor fatigued, you instead gain a +3 morale bonus to Strength-, Dexterity- and Constitution-based ability checks and skill checks, and you gain a +10 enhancement bonus to your speed for all of your modes of movement until the end of your next turn.
